title: Bruno Fernandes: Why Manchester United fans have a new hero - Peter Crouch analysis
description: Arrogant, cheeky and a touch of class - MOTD2 pundit Peter Crouch explains why Bruno Fernandes has already made a big impact at Manchester United.

title: Housing shortage: Scale of UK's housing gap revealed
description: Renters speak of struggling to get on the property ladder, amid a shortage of over one million homes.

title: Tyson Fury: 'Maverick Fury can do no wrong but Anthony Joshua fight will seal immortality'
description: After his seventh-round defeat of Deontay Wilder, a unique place in sporting history awaits Tyson Fury if he secures a unification fight against Anthony Joshua.

title: Coronavirus: Wuhan Britons end quarantine as cruise passengers isolate
description: The 118 evacuees leave after 14 days, as 30 others from a virus-hit cruise ship begin their isolation.

title: Coronavirus: Mass masked wedding in the Philippines
description: The annual event saw added coronavirus precautions as more than 200 couples tied the knot.

title: Coronavirus: South Korea declares highest alert as infections surge
description: The president says the country faces "a grave turning point" and the next few days will be crucial.

title: Women's T20 World Cup: England lose Amy Jones after quickfire start against South Africa
description: England lose their first wicket as opener Amy Jones departs after making 23 off 20 balls against South Africa in the Women's T20 World Cup.

title: Tyson Fury on his heavyweight title win over Deontay Wilder: 'Not bad for an old fat guy who can't punch'
description: Watch the best moments from Tyson Fury's post-fight news conference following his WBC heavyweight title win over Deontay Wilder in Las Vegas.

title: Flooding across Scotland leaves cars submerged
description: One woman has to be rescued from her vehicle by canoe after her car became deluged by floodwater.

title: Harry Dunn crash: Family urge government to block Julian Assange extradition
description: The family's demand comes after the US refused to extradite the suspect involved in Mr Dunn's death.

title: How social media reacted to Wilder v Fury II
description: Tyson Fury powered up the Las Vegas lights with a brutal display of boxing - this is how social media and the boxing world reacted.

title: 'Mad' Mike Hughes dies after crash-landing homemade rocket
description: "Mad" Mike Hughes, 64, wanted to launch himself into space to prove that the Earth was flat.

title: Bernie Sanders cements front-runner status with Nevada caucuses win
description: He is projected to win in Nevada's caucuses, putting him further on course to take on Donald Trump.

title: Tyson Fury beats Deontay Wilder in world title fight in Las Vegas
description: Tyson Fury wins the WBC world heavyweight title after producing a sensational performance against Deontay Wilder.

title: The Papers: Lords expenses 'out of control' and No 10 mocks EU
description: Brexit trade talks and an expenses investigation are among the top stories in Sunday's newspapers.

title: Brexit: Emmanuel Macron 'not sure' of UK-EU trade deal by end of year
description: The French president's doubts come as the UK government is set to publish its demands.

title: Coronavirus: Russia denies spreading US conspiracy on social media
description: US officials accused “malign” Russian actors of promoting unfounded theories about the virus online.

title: Encephalitis: 'I couldn't remember my boyfriend'
description: Georgia Lee is 23 but feels like she's 17 after a virus which affected her memory and also took her sense of smell.

title: Simone Biles on abuse, race and life after gymnastics
description: Simone Biles takes time out of training in Texas to answer questions from young fans around the world.

title: Dubs or subs? Parasite renews debate on how to watch foreign films
description: Subtitles are the film connoisseur's choice - but Netflix is sounding the dub-a-dub-dub for dubbing.

title: We will 'fight to the death' to save the Amazon rainforest
description: Teenagers from the Amazon rainforest speak about their hopes for the future.

title: Dead within three hours of arrival at a Russian prison
description: Despite claims that Russian prisons are cleaning up their act, inmates and their families tell a different story.

title: Brixton Hill police pursuit hit-and-run death: Man charged
description: Quincy Anyiam, 26, is accused of causing the death of Anisha Vidal-Garner in Brixton Hill.

title: Hip-hop's iconic photos go on display
description: The International Center of Photography is showcasing photos of hip-hop's greatest stars.

title: Sheringham Viking Festival 'warrior' finds faith in Norse gods
description: Viking re-enactor Richard Mehmed says he found faith with Norse gods while "wielding a six-foot axe".

title: The 'ironmums' (and 'irongrans') taking on endurance feats
description: Three so-called "ironmums" explain the appeal of taking on one of sport's most gruelling challenges.
